m :  your yard is always so beautiful  cathy .  you must have a gardener .

w :  oh  no .  it would cost at least fifty dollars a month to hire someone to do the work  so i did most of it myself .  i enjoy taking care of the flowers  but i have to force myself to do the weeding and cut the grass .

question: why does cathy do most of the gardening herself ?
choice: because a gardener isn ' t experienced as she is .
because she wants to save money .
answer: because she wants to save money .
